channel.title: Experience on Manav Garg @sigmapie8

item.title: Product Experience: Mybyk
item.description:
This Dussehra (or Dasara), I found myself in Mysuru, Karnataka, with no uber/ola support and normal autos charging double or triple the usual fare because they could. My savior, a small mobility startup that has a strong presence in Mysuru, or at least I can vouch for the 5km radius around Mysore Palace - MyByk.

What drew me in was the availability. There was always a bike hub nearby and the prices were affordable. For example, I got an unlimited day pass for â‚¹85, that would get me a cycle for 24 hours. To my surprise, the cycles were electric, and saved me a lot of pedaling.
